dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, it's like building a fortress around a sandcastle, but in this case, the sandcastles are our schools and playgrounds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, it's like building a fortress around a sandcastle, but in this case, the sandcastles are our schools and playgrounds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it sounds like Kazakhstan is taking that seriously. Minister Yerzhan Sadenov just announced they're adjusting police routes to focus on those areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it sounds like Kazakhstan is taking that seriously. Minister Yerzhan Sadenov just announced they're adjusting police routes to focus on those areas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities in Kazakhstan have stepped up safety measures around schools and areas where children gather, Minister of Internal Affairs Yerzhan Sadenov said at a government meeting. According to the minister, police patrol routes have been adjusted to focus on schools and playgrounds, with increased monitoring at pedestrian crossings and intersections.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, with increased monitoring at pedestrian crossings and intersections, which is uh, a really practical step.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, with increased monitoring at pedestrian crossings and intersections, which is uh, a really practical step.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the minister, police patrol routes have been adjusted to focus on schools and playgrounds, with increased monitoring at pedestrian crossings and intersections.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're also inspecting school transportation compliance—making sure buses and everything are up to standard.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're also inspecting school transportation compliance-making sure buses and everything are up to standard.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Inspections of school transportation compliance are also underway.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But during those inspections, they found some pretty significant infrastructure problems, like missing traffic lights and road signs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But during those inspections, they found some pretty significant infrastructure problems, like missing traffic lights and road signs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "During inspections, infrastructure deficiencies were identified " including missing traffic lights, road signs, and markings " in the regions of Ulytau, Zhetysu, and Abai, as well as in Atyrau, West Kazakhstan, North Kazakhstan, and Kyzylorda regions," Sadenov said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, specifically in regions like Ulytau, Zhetysu, Abai, and a few others. That's a lot of ground to cover.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, specifically in regions like Ulytau, Zhetysu, Abai, and a few others. That's a lot of ground to cover.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "During inspections, infrastructure deficiencies were identified " including missing traffic lights, road signs, and markings " in the regions of Ulytau, Zhetysu, and Abai, as well as in Atyrau, West Kazakhstan, North Kazakhstan, and Kyzylorda regions," Sadenov said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It is, and the local governments, the akimats, have been told to fix all those issues by September 1, 2025.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is, and the local governments, the akimats, have been told to fix all those issues by September one, twenty twenty five.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Akimats (local government administrations) have been instructed to address all identified issues by September 1, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which gives them a solid timeline, but it's still a huge undertaking, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which gives them a solid timeline, but it's still a huge undertaking, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And on top of that, there was another piece of news—student stipends are being increased starting this academic year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And on top of that, there was another piece of news-student stipends are being increased starting this academic year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Vice Minister of Science and Higher Education announced that student stipends in Kazakhstan will be increased beginning with the new academic year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, so it's not just about physical safety; they're also investing in students' financial well-being.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, so it's not just about physical safety; they're also investing in students' financial well-being.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, which feels like a broader effort to support young people from all angles.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, which feels like a broader effort to support young people from all angles.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, safer streets and more support for education—that's a pretty strong combo.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, safer streets and more support for education-that's a pretty strong combo.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Let's hope the local governments can meet that 2025 deadline without too many hiccups.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Let's hope the local governments can meet that twenty twenty five deadline without too many hiccups.
